remediation: Avoid using all malicious instances of the 2e6d5f64604be31 package.
title: Malicious Package

vulnDescription.Overview: 2e6d5f64604be31 is a malicious package. This package contains malicious code, and its content was removed from the official package manager. While this package might be attempting to impersonate a valid organization, there is no connection between that organization and this package authorship.
